title: 9/1/2022 Large, Sunny 1 Bedroom apt in Victorian House for rent
posting_body: Available for September 1, 2022
This third floor 1 bedroom apartment has lots of charm.
The apartment has a large size bedroom with large walkin closets, 8' high ceilings, updated kitchen and countertops, hardwood floors throughout apartment.
Large living room and several walk in closets.
On street parking.
Laundry on premise with coin operated washers and dryers in basement.
The heating system is a forced hot water system fueled by natural gas.
Municipal water and sewer, electricity, telephone, cable television and natural gas service the subject property.
Monthly rent is due by the first of each month.
Utilities are separate.
Gas and electricity are the responsibility of the tenant.
The length of the rental agreement is a month to month tenancy at will with 2 months written notice of any change.
The first months rent and security will be required when the tenant agrees and signs the rental agreement.
The large 6 family Victorian house on Franklin Street is located in the Harmony Grove section of Framingham.
The subject property has convenient access to all kinds of things.
Any kind of shopping you want is within a short drive from the house.
There are many major roadways and public transportation near by.
The major routes within a short drive include; Route 90 (MassPike), Route 9, Route 495, Route 27, Route 30, Route 126 and Route 135.
The Framingham MBTA Commuter Rail Station is located within walking distance of the property (about a 5 minute walk).
PLEASE NOTE: Tenant will need to fill out an application and complete a paperwork to run a credit and background check but NO Broker Fee.
Pre-Requisites: NO DOGS & No smokers in the house
